name: unreconcilable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unreconcilable beliefs, decisions, differences etc. are opposite to each other and cannot exist together: There is a severe, perhaps unreconcilable, difference of opinion on this issue. It has been argued that these divisions are unreconcilable. Synonym
irreconcilable
More examplesFewer examplesHe pulled out his party from the government, citing unreconcilable differences with coalition partners. Different clinicians frequently make quite different, even opposite and unreconcilable decisions when assessing the same patient. The differences do not lie in unreconcilable opinions, but rather in a quibbling over words.
